I've got a situation where I am creating a jar file to be used in a couple of 
other projects.

The jarred project has separate src and test directories, and the test classes 
can be jarred along with the source class. I want to be able to run the test 
cases in the jar file in addition to the project specific tests. 

Is it possible to run the test classes (through Ant) without expanding the jar, 
or picking up some other (possibly existing) *Test classes from the classpath?

Thanks,

George McKinney
